choose.when: SELECT v1.vid FROM iptv_res_daily_play p INNER JOIN iptv_res r1 ON (p.rid=r1.rid AND r1.global_disable=0 AND r1.media_ok=1 AND r1.type=#{type}) INNER JOIN iptv_res_ver v1 ON (v1.rid=r1.rid AND r1.test_vid=v1.vid AND v1.version_disable=0) WHERE p.daily BETWEEN #{from} AND #{to} GROUP BY p.rid ORDER BY SUM(p.play_num) DESC LIMIT #{size}
choose.otherwise: SELECT v1.vid FROM iptv_res_daily_play p INNER JOIN iptv_res r1 ON (p.rid=r1.rid AND r1.global_disable=0 AND r1.media_ok=1 AND r1.type=#{type}) INNER JOIN iptv_res_ver v1 ON (v1.rid=r1.rid AND r1.prod_vid=v1.vid AND v1.version_disable=0) WHERE p.daily BETWEEN #{from} AND #{to} GROUP BY p.rid ORDER BY SUM(p.play_num) DESC LIMIT #{size}

mapper.update: INSERT INTO iptv_res_daily_play(daily,rid,play_num)VALUES(#{date},#{rid},1) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE play_num=play_num+1
